name: Kevin Petrowsky
text: Wish I could rate this store to be as good as Logansport's and Wabash's. Do they need a new and better oven? Perhaps that could be some of the reason why my experiences at the other two is beyond expectation compared to Peru's undercooked food and the differences in taste.

name: Stacy Cardwell
text: Very good very hot and fresh only hiccup was that they didn't cut the pizza very well. Need to learn how to cut the pizza the right way all the way through

name: Wendy Miser
text: Pizza needs cooked longer, not done in time frame they gave. Also pan pizza is not like I remember it.  Crust not as thick

name: Jessamyn Burnett
text: They usually have really good service, but the last time we ordered, they brought us the wrong pizza.

name: Nathan Carolan
text: Ordered online, said pizza would be ready in 15-20min. Was 10min away when I placed the order and when I got there my pizza was already done!

name: Lavel Burney
text: Dillion and Kirsten are the best employees ever!

name: Martha Wyatt
text: I was not happy with my order today. I ordered a big box with cheese breadsticks and buffalo mild boneless wings. My pizza was burnt and I didn’t get my wings. I understand times are hard but the money I paid was not worth the the one hour and half wait time or the food. Not happy at all!

name: Christopher Himes
text: Staff are always on their phones and are rude... I worked here for a couple weeks. Thought everything was going  great. Then my wife got sick and ended up in the hospital for a few days I informed the management about this and she said it …More

name: kendra morecraft
text: The dining room remodel really looks nice. The food was good & the server was friendly. We'll definitely be back.

name: Eric Drake
text: Terrible. Called our order in over the phone 10 minutes ahead of time, we were given a 25 minute time frame to make the order. I sat in store for 35 minutes waiting. 6 other people came in and left with their order before mine was done. I …More

name: James Chadwell
text: The manager was awesome. We were late, she still served us. And it's some of the best pizza we've ever had. Well done short cool chick ;)

name: John Shutter
text: I just called at about 5pm on 06/28/2020 to order a few pizzas for a gathering we are having. A young man I could barely understand answered the phone. Asked if my order was pickup or delivery. I started to talk and he hung up the phone on …More

name: Zach Lautzenheiser
text: Pretty crazy how a driver can drive past your house to deliver someone else's pizza, but won't deliver to your house. Even called about it just to see if they would deliver here after that.

name: Midwest 13
text: Horrible experience. There’s no excuses why a pizza should be over cooked with hard crust when the business is NOT busy and nobody is in there. This is the third time I have ordered food at Pizza Hut in Peru, and the meat is beyond dry. …More

name: Amanda Stewart
text: I don't know why we keep trying to go here assuming it will get any better. Every single time, we get the same old tired excuses as to why there is almost impressively bad service and food takes twice as long to get out than it should. …More

name: Chas Wilson
text: Wonderful service and great pizza

name: Joshua Oliver
text: Avoid ordering here during the weekend. This is the second time I've order online and the staff has been so short staffed or failed to keep up on orders. I placed an order at 7:51pm on 8/23 and my expected delivery is 10:30. When I called …More

name: Charlie Brown
text: I think you you already know what you need to improve at your stores. Product is outstanding! Service and employee enthusiasm need to have their standards and income raised for sure.

name: Kat Thimlar
text: 3" diameter of center was doughy

name: nick steele
text: Order was wrong..... manager guy was not very friendly ... fixed the order but buy  that time rest was cold....

name: Amanda Reed
text: Slid my pizza off onto the counter ( the one at the register were you pay) after I already waited for an hour.  Acted surprised when I didn't want it.  Big nope for me, won't be back.

name: Dylan Hansen
text: I went here the other day and the waitress made sure are pizza was done just right, one of the best pizza's I've ever had from pizza hut.

name: Justin Wilcox
text: Friendly staff and the food was good.  I did have to wait for a refill, but the were pretty busy.

name: Connie Lusher
text: Service was great and so was the food!

name: Raeann Murphy
text: Always delicious and good deals if you order online

name: Addie Reed
text: cold and slow. we ordered two personal pans. it took almost 30 minutes. the pizza was good.

name: Nathanael Sumpter
text: They have some of the best garlic bread sticks.

name: Lisa Wogerman
text: Hot, fresh and not overcooked. Waitress was friendly and had a great attitude

name: Jordan Oliver
text: The delivery time said 35-45 minutes and they was at my house in 20, it was a little bit of a inconvenience because I was balls deep in my wife at the time , but the pizza was really good

name: Carl Hedge
text: Food good. The waitress not coming to the table much to check on us and it was very slow when we were there.

name: Ruth McCarty
text: This Pizza hut does not carry the taco pizza.  It also does not have cinnamon candy or mints.  The service was good.  The salad bar was a sloppy mess.  They are not my favorite Pizza Hut.

name: Amber FLATLAND
text: I feel the quality of food has decreased as the years have passed.

name: Wendy Wilson
text: Dining area needed cleaned and they had no forks for customers.

name: R Duckwall
text: Great pizza.  A little under staffed for the after holidays rush.  Order was correct if a little slow.

name: Brianna Dilts
text: They have the best pizza and deals on pizza

name: April Montgomery
text: Salad bar was dirty and being cleaned with items missing. eggs bacon and other foods were frozen. Brought wrong flavor of wings. Spaghetti had almost no sauce and curly pasta. That's not spaghetti! Soup was almost hot. Service was almost friendly. We will go somewhere else next time.

name: Spectre Stuvart
text: Friendly Staff, good environment. The only thing I miss is the old buffet setups. But I understand the removal of buffets in certain places because people can be disgusting. I still think PIZZA hut can do better.

name: Lucas LaBare
text: The Staff is on point! The pizza is always made to perfection! Can't get enough of the wings here. Good stuff! (Now if only the pizza had a thicker base.) Price point is a little higher than the other pizza places around town.

name: jason iliff
text: Salad/lettuce was brown....help looked tired......and food was not the best

name: TiptonFord Derek
text: Absolutely terrible. Placed an order online. Said pickup in 10-20 minutes. I've now been here 35 minutes and still no food. I've seen 10 customers come and go but nothing on my food. Noone checking on me. No apology. No explanation. Nothing. I never eat here, and now I know why. Wont come back. Unacceptable.

name: Kristen Edwards 'McKinley'
text: Food was good today... They are usually always slammed Fridays and Saturdays so expect delays occasionally

name: Robert Maldonado
text: Best wings in town

name: Ambrosia Rimmer
text: Always good food. Always good, speedy, and polite service.

name: Steph Ostafin
text: The salad bar here is the best in town!

name: shwetha lv
text: Hand tossed pizza was well made and the toppings were generously put. More vegetarian options.. Ambience was good too.

name: Jeffery Coomer
text: Just average. Nothing special about Pizza Hut these days.

name: Kenny Slater
text: Pizza was good and our waitress was very nice.  But, there was hardly anyone there.  Shame

name: Sherry Sheldon
text: Pizzas gotten outrageously ridiculously priced and it is grossand they think that I'm stupid because they charge me more for a large when the medium has the same amount of slices and I remember when a large pizza was actually large it fed almost 6 people and that's at least two slices each

name: Joe Case
text: Remodeled on inside and outside and great food and awesome staff.

name: Derek Manriquez
text: The waitress was actually nice, I ordered 3 large pizzas and 3 family orders of breadsticks and 7 drinks worth about $64.00. After we were done eating we still had 1.5 large pizzas left and 2 family orders of breadsticks left so I asked for …More

name: mitchell Richardson
text: Great dry rub wings friendly waitress,

name: Bonnie Davis
text: Pizza was delivered over 40 minutes later then expected.  Got email it would be delivered by 5:50pm received at 6:30 pm.  Boxes were crushed, like several other pizza carriers had been set on them.  Pizza was lukewarm to cold and bread …More

name: Gina Friend
text:
We have never had unsatisfactory pizza from you before but today was different.
We ordered the 2 medium pizza special. Used delivery for the first time. Both pizzas was very dark and the dough was flat. Very disappointed.

name: Bill Miller
text: Ordered bread stix and medium pizza with extra cheese. Bread sticks were cold when delivered to our table. Told waitress and she took them back. Was brought back still cold. Told them again and didn't get new bread sticks until our pizza was already at our table which did not have any extra cheese at all. Not going back.

text: I called to order for delivery and was told they are not delivering because they was busy! I've NEVER heard of such ridiculousness! They will not get my services again!

text: Love Pizza Hut.  Always delicious, always great service.  Thank you.

name: Robert Kinnett
text: Went there this evening with my family. Ordered two large pizzas and after an hour and twenty minute wait, they still werent ready. There may have 15 people in there and we werent the only ones to get up and leave without receiving our …More

name: Rebecca Dawn
text: I read a review about a week ago and I knew it would be removed. I figured out how to upload it again so just click on my name and select photos.❤️ That man's post could not be anymore true, hopefully Pizza Hut will get better at some point!
